mapper.select: select id, passport_id, rise_id, user_type, nick_name, real_name, member_id, wechat, signature, emotion_status, mobile, email, avatar, sex, birthday, country_code, country, province_code, province, city_code, city, education, job_status, college, company, industry, profession, position, position_level, work_year, channel_code, channel_type, channel_type_id, channel_group, channel_group_id, channel_name, status, created_by, modified_by, create_time, update_time, extension_code from iquanwai.user_info where id = #{id}

select id, passport_id, rise_id, user_type, nick_name, real_name, member_id, wechat, signature, emotion_status, mobile, email, avatar, sex, birthday, country_code, country, province_code, province, city_code, city, education, job_status, college, company, industry, profession, position, position_level, work_year, channel_code, channel_type, channel_type_id, channel_group, channel_group_id, channel_name, status, created_by, modified_by, create_time, update_time, extension_code from iquanwai.user_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into iquanwai.user_info(passport_id, rise_id, user_type, nick_name, real_name, member_id, wechat, signature, emotion_status, mobile, email, avatar, sex, birthday, country_code, country, province_code, province, city_code, city, education, job_status, college, company, industry, profession, position, position_level, work_year, channel_code, channel_type, channel_type_id, channel_group, channel_group_id, channel_name, status, created_by, modified_by, create_time, update_time, extension_code) values (#{passportId}, #{riseId}, #{userType}, #{nickName}, #{realName}, #{memberId}, #{wechat}, #{signature}, #{emotionStatus}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{avatar}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{countryCode}, #{country}, #{provinceCode}, #{province}, #{cityCode}, #{city}, #{education}, #{jobStatus}, #{college}, #{company}, #{industry}, #{profession}, #{position}, #{positionLevel}, #{workYear}, #{channelCode}, #{channelType}, #{channelTypeId}, #{channelGroup}, #{channelGroupId}, #{channelName}, #{status}, #{createdBy}, #{modifiedBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{extensionCode})
mapper.update:
update iquanwai.user_info
passport_id = #{passportId},
rise_id = #{riseId},
user_type = #{userType},
nick_name = #{nickName},
real_name = #{realName},
member_id = #{memberId},
wechat = #{wechat},
signature = #{signature},
emotion_status = #{emotionStatus},
mobile = #{mobile},
email = #{email},
avatar = #{avatar},
sex = #{sex},
birthday = #{birthday},
country_code = #{countryCode},
country = #{country},
province_code = #{provinceCode},
province = #{province},
city_code = #{cityCode},
city = #{city},
education = #{education},
job_status = #{jobStatus},
college = #{college},
company = #{company},
industry = #{industry},
profession = #{profession},
position = #{position},
position_level = #{positionLevel},
work_year = #{workYear},
channel_code = #{channelCode},
channel_type = #{channelType},
channel_type_id = #{channelTypeId},
channel_group = #{channelGroup},
channel_group_id = #{channelGroupId},
channel_name = #{channelName},
status = #{status},
created_by = #{createdBy},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
extension_code = #{extensionCode},
where id = #{id}
